channel.title: Items in shops
channel.description:
I want to make Lowe's arrow shop in varrock. I read all tuts what i found,and i cant find whats the wrong. my compiler dont drop out any error messages only this: Note:stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note:recompile with -xlint:deprecation for details But i think a had this message before i tried to do the shop,too. So i made Lowe,i can trade with him,but his shop is empy! :eek: My shops.cfg (i have pimpscape client): [code]//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount shop = 1 Lowe's_shop 2 2 0882 50000 0884 30000 0886 70000 7552 20000 0890 80000 0892 60000 [ENDOFSHOPLIST][/code]
AND i use TABs,& i edited the client.java. item IDs: i tried with 882 and with 0882 too ,and tried the 7552 for mith arrowz but it doesnt works. is the too high amount can be a problem? i hope u can help quickly,THX

item.title: Items in shops
item.dc:creator: @Teutobod Teutobod
item.description:
@Teutobod wrote:

if u mean this in client.java…
}
else if (NPCID == 550) { // Lowe’s arrows
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1; //Lowe’s arrows
}

…yes

item.title: Items in shops
item.dc:creator: @Teutobod Teutobod
item.description:
@Teutobod wrote:

I want to make Lowe’s arrow shop in varrock.
I read all tuts what i found,and i cant find whats the wrong.
my compiler dont drop out any error messages only this:
Note:stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note:recompile with -xlint:deprecation for details
But i think a had this message before i tried to do the shop,too.
So i made Lowe,i can trade with him,but his shop is empy! :eek:
My shops.cfg (i have pimpscape client):

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount shop = 1 Lowe's_shop 2 2 0882 50000 0884 30000 0886 70000 7552 20000 0890 80000 0892 60000 [ENDOFSHOPLIST]

AND i use TABs,& i edited the client.java.
item IDs: i tried with 882 and with 0882 too ,and tried the 7552 for mith arrowz but it doesnt works.
is the too high amount can be a problem?
i hope u can help quickly,THX

Read full topic
